issue.title: (#4) Added ability to specify whether release is a prerelease

repository.name: releasecat-maven-plugin
repository.description: A maven plugin that creates GitHub releases for your project.

issue.body:
This PR:
* closes #4 
* Adds ability to specify whether the release is a prerelease (default is `false`)
* Left puzzle in order to complete tests due to [this](https://github.com/jcabi/jcabi-github/issues/1363) bug

body: @llorllale do you want to contribute with a PR? This project has no funds, but we will appreciate your help.
@yegor256 sure, I'll give it a shot

Job [#1363](https://github.com/jcabi/jcabi-github/issues/1363) is now in scope, role is `DEV`

@amihaiemil[/z](https://www.0crat.com/u/amihaiemil) everybody who has role `DEV` are banned at this job; I won't be able to assign anyone automatically; consider assigning someone manually or invite more people to the project, as explained in [ยง51](http://www.zerocracy.com/policy.html#51)

<!-- https://www.0crat.com/footprint/C9R53K5JA/1020135700, version: 1.0-SNAPSHOT, hash: ac73475e -->

@llorllale I think the simplest way is:

```java
Boolean.TRUE.equals(this.json().getBoolean(name))
```

I will have a look over it this weekend, maybe I can solve it :)

The job [#1363](https://github.com/jcabi/jcabi-github/issues/1363) assigned to @amihaiemil[/z](https://www.0crat.com/u/amihaiemil), here is [why](https://www.0crat.com/footprint/C9R53K5JA/1031160063); the budget is 30 minutes, see [ยง4](http://www.zerocracy.com/policy.html#4); please, read [ยง8](http://www.zerocracy.com/policy.html#8) and [ยง9](http://www.zerocracy.com/policy.html#9); if the task is not clear, read [this](http://www.yegor256.com/2015/02/16/it-is-not-a-school.html) and [this](http://www.yegor256.com/2015/01/15/how-to-cut-corners.html)
